item.description:
Lets meet early to to find good seating. I was told there will be signage on the sidewalk pointing into the courtyard area you have to walk into. There should be plenty of parking on the street on a Sunday. There is a garage on York stree and also Chapel street (between york and Park).

Yale's Summer Cabaret in the garden. Oscar Wilde. 7pm. WiP [WORKS IN PROGRESS]
This summer we are delighted to present new works in progress. The event is free and open to the public, but we recommend making reservations at summer.cabaret@yale.edu or (203) 432-1567, as seating is limited.

The Illustrated Fairy Tales of Oscar Wilde
Conceived and Adapted by Jesse Jou and Dipika Guha
The gorgeous, brittle fairy tales of Oscar Wilde come to vibrant life in this new adaptation.
item.how_to_find_us: 6:30 in the garden area black and white scarf with piano keys
item.name: The Illustrated Fairy Tales of Oscar Wilde
